Windows Registry Editor Version 5.00

[HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINESOFTWAREWow6432NodeValveSteam]
"InstallPath"="C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam"

[HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINESoftwareValveSteam]
"InstallPath"="C:\Program Files\Steam"

Save the text file as steamreg.reg file and double click on it.
